page.title: 05FAMILY LIFE 2.
page.content: Also on the ground floor there is a bathroom and toilet, a kitchen and a small room which I use for doing my Husband's office work in.Lots of houses now have central heating but we do not. We have just about an acre of land surrounding the property. Most of this is laid down to grass with a few flower beds and a vegetable patch. Also in our family we have three dogs called Toby,Tess and Bruce; two cats called Twinkle and Tucker and two rabbits called Misty and Thumper. My husband is a Chartered Building Surveyor and is self-employed. He has his office in Ashford High Street and I work for my husband doing administration work at home.
